name: 2024 9th International Conference on Intelligent Information Technology
content: Publication & Indexing: 1\. Conference Proceedings, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by CPCI. 2\. Journal of Advances in Information Technology (ISSN: 1798-2340; CiteScore: 3.1): indexed by ESCI (Web of Science), Scopus, EBSCO, Google Scholar, CNKI, Crossref, etc. 3\. Presentation Only: For those who do not want to publish paper, abstract can be submitted for reviewing of presentation.
